item.title: Mark Gordon for governor 2022
item.description: Mark Gordon for governor Mark Gordon was elected Wyomingâ€™s 33rd Governor, on Nov. 6, 2018. He was sworn into office on January 7, 2019. Mark Gordon grew up on the family ranch in Wyoming where he learned the values of hard work and integrity and the importance of working together. As Governor, he brings those values to the table, maintaining his commitment to a Wyoming where its citizens can pursue their dreams while the state retains its unique character.
